biography_text: CRAIG, Angela, a Representative from Minnesota; born in West Helena, Phillips County, Arkansas, on February 14, 1972; graduated from Nettleton High School, Jonesboro, Ark.; B.A., University of Memphis, Memphis, Tenn., 1994; journalist; healthcare company manager; unsuccessful candidate for election to the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress in 2016; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
